dict.acceptation: 交换；经营…交易，做…的买卖；

sent.orig: That is Mr Obama's stated aim, but the prospects for a comprehensive cap-and-trade bill look poor.
sent.trans: 这也是奥巴马申明的目标，但是碳总量管制及交易(cap-and-trade)法案的前景并不看好。

sent.orig: A trade requires training and skill with the hands.
sent.trans: trade指需要受过训练有手艺的职业。

sent.orig: His cap-and-trade bill to reduce carbon dioxide emissions passed the House of Representatives in June.
sent.trans: 他旨在减少二氧化碳排放的限制与交易(cap-and-trade)法案于6月获国会众议院通过。

sent.orig: Are the opponents of cap-and-trade relying on different studies that reach fundamentally different conclusions?
sent.trans: 反对“总量管制和交易”(cap-and-trade)人士依据的不同研究是否得出不同的结论？

sent.orig: Business scope of international trade, entrepot trade, regional trade and trade between enterprises under processing finishing.
sent.trans: 经营范围系国际贸易，转口贸易、区内企业之间贸易及贸易项下加工整理。
